Right... the wiki solves only one part of the "problem" (collecting relevan=
t links), but does not solve the periodic distribution. As I said, I don't =
mind setting up a blog to which I'd publish the weekly links if the wiki pa=
rt seems to work for collecting information.

So, let's give the wiki a try=
 first and see how it goes.

Ivan
